vehicles.description: A blue car is driving on the lane parallel to ours on our left, heading in the same direction as our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: The appearance of this car requires it to maintain a safe distance and may need to adjust speed to avoid collision when the blue car changes lanes.

vehicles.description: A silver car is on the left side of our car, slightly ahead, and traveling in the same direction.
vehicles.explanation: The vehicle should monitor whether the other vehicle has any sudden stops or turns, as these may affect its own driving route.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A pedestrian is on the sidewalk to the right, wearing a red jacket and black pants.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Even though there are currently no pedestrians on the road, autonomous vehicles should be prepared to stop or slow down in case pedestrians suddenly step onto the street.

traffic signs.description: At the intersection ahead, there is a traffic light on the right showing a green signal.
traffic signs.explanation: The main vehicle has the right of way at the intersection unless an unexpected situation occurs.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are two vehicles, one vulnerable road user, and a traffic sign. 

The first vehicle is a blue car driving on the lane parallel to ours on our left, heading in the same direction as our vehicle. This requires our vehicle to maintain a safe distance and may need to adjust speed to avoid collision when the blue car changes lanes. 

The second vehicle is a silver car on the left side of our car, slightly ahead, and traveling in the same direction. Our vehicle should monitor whether the other vehicle has any sudden stops or turns, as these may affect its own driving route. 

There is also a pedestrian on the sidewalk to the right, wearing a red jacket and black pants. Even though there are currently no pedestrians on the road, autonomous vehicles should be prepared to stop or slow down in case pedestrians suddenly step onto the street. 

Lastly, at the intersection ahead, there is a traffic light on the right showing a green signal. This indicates that the main vehicle has the right of way at the intersection unless an unexpected situation occurs. 

There are no traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects present in the image.

driving_suggestion: The vehicle should continue to move forward at a cautious speed that is adaptive to the environment while maintaining a safe distance from the car ahead. Simultaneously, be vigilant of any potential movements of pedestrians on the sidewalks and be prepared to react when necessary. The driver should also monitor traffic lights in order to respond to signal changes.

1.description and explanation: A pedestrian is visible on the sidewalk. The presence of a pedestrian in proximity to the roadway is an important consideration for the ego car, warranting caution. The driver should be aware of the possibility that the pedestrian may decide to cross the road, and they must be prepared to stop or slow down to give way if the pedestrian steps onto the crosswalk.
